## Example - Print information for each user.

```python
from posit.connect import Client

with Client() as client:
    for user in client.users.find():
        print(user)
```

## Example - Update content title.

```python
from posit.connect import Client

with Client() as client:
    content_item = client.content.get('69ff7ba4-56c9-40d9-b094-6d0b1a07d516')
    content_item.update(title="New Title")
```

## Example - Print information for a single user.

```python
from posit.connect import Client

with Client() as client:
    user = client.users.find_one()
    print(user)
```

## Example - Print my user information.

```python
from posit.connect import Client

with Client() as client:
    print(client.me)
```


## Example - Get user by their unique identifer.

```python
from posit.connect import Client

with Client() as client:
    user1 = client.users.find_one()
    user2 = client.users.get(user.guid)
    print(user1 == user2)
```

## Example - Update my user information.

```python
from posit.connect import Client

with Client() as client:
    user = client.me
    user.update(first_name="Bob")
```
